Reviews.Title: I Bought Two
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: I liked the first one so much, I bought a second.  Both went into bedrooms.  The sound is good.  They were super easy to install and start watching.  The picture is good.  We are very happy with our purchases.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: This is the second 32 inch JVC tv I've bought and both have an awesome picture. The sound is great. I plan on getting another for one of my kids for Christmas.

ProductInfo.Features:
E-LED Backlit
Crystal Color Technology
Xinema Sound
1080p Full HD
USB Multimedia Support
ProductInfo.Name: JVC JLE32BC3001 32-Inches 1080p LED HDTV
